title: Cinthia's reuenge: or Mænanders extasie
author: Stephens, John, fl. 1613-1615.
publisher: Printed for Roger Barnes, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancery-lane, ouer against the Rolles,
notes: Dedication signed: I.S., i.e. John Stephens.
A variant, probably earlier, has the author's name on title page.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
